statements: SELECT * FROM customer_spending
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_info LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, category FROM customer_spending ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_spending WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, recommendation FROM customer_spending WHERE category = 'Food'
SELECT category, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spending FROM customer_spending GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_spending DESC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customer_info WHERE first_name = 'John' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customer_spending WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customer_info WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND last_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT customer_id, recommendation FROM customer_spending WHERE category = 'Food' AND transaction_amount > 50 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns;
SELECT name, email FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM FinancialRecommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, recommendation_text FROM FinancialRecommendations WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, total_spent FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns WHERE total_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, total_spent FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND total_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, f.recommendation_text FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns c JOIN FinancialRecommendations f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id;
SELECT MAX(total_spent) AS max_spent, MIN(total_spent) AS min_spent FROM CustomerSpendingPatterns;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS recommendation_count FROM FinancialRecommendations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, recommendation FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, recommendation FROM customers INNER JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customer_personal_info;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer_personal_info WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT advice_text, advice_date FROM financial_advice ORDER BY advice_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount, category FROM customer_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM customer_personal_info WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_personal_info WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer_personal_info WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT advice_text, advice_date FROM financial_advice WHERE customer_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890' ORDER BY advice_date DESC;
SELECT category, amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM recommendation_history WHERE customer_id = '5678abcd-9012-efgh-3456-ijkl7890mnop' ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, gender, location FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE category='Groceries' AND amount > 50;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, category, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM SpendingCategories WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT customer_id, recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE LENGTH(recommendation_text) > 50 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT customer_id, goal_description, target_amount, deadline FROM FinancialGoals WHERE target_amount > 5000 ORDER BY deadline ASC;
